roleset.name: sell at wholesale, sell in large bulk or quantity
roleset.note: WHOLESALE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wholesale' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'retail'. (from wholesale.01-v)

WHOLESALE-N NOTES: Roleset based on parallel expansion with WordNet. Roleset based on verb entry wholesale.01. No VerbNet entry for related verb "wholesale". No FrameNet entry. Framed by Claire. (from wholesale.01-n)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Washington Red Delicious, by the way, are wholesaling for less than $10 a box these days.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Popularly famed for their wholesale of diamonds, Tresor Paris set out to make a line of affordable bracelets...

example.name: Args 0, 1, 3 & 4
example.text: John's wholesale of beaverskin hats at $10 per pound on behalf of Wall Street tycoons landed him in prison.
example.arg: on behalf of Wall Street tycoons

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: tax the wholesale of the product to retail outlets.
